# hyperping_maintenance_windows (Data Source)

Fetches the list of all Hyperping maintenance windows.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `maintenance_windows` (Attributes List) List of maintenance windows. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--maintenance_windows))

<a id="nestedatt--maintenance_windows"></a>
### Nested Schema for `maintenance_windows`

Read-Only:

- `created_by` (String) The email of the user who created this maintenance window.
- `end_date` (String) The end date in ISO 8601 format.
- `id` (String) The unique identifier (UUID) of the maintenance window.
- `monitors` (List of String) List of monitor UUIDs affected by this maintenance.
- `name` (String) The internal name of the maintenance window.
- `start_date` (String) The start date in ISO 8601 format.
- `status_pages` (List of String) List of status page UUIDs this maintenance is displayed on.
- `text` (String) The description text of the maintenance window (English).
- `timezone` (String) The timezone of the maintenance window.
- `title` (String) The public title of the maintenance window (English).
